data.title: List of Netherlands international footballers
data.text:
This is the list of players that have played for the Netherlands national football team, ever since the first match against Belgium on April 30, 1905. It includes all players with correct statistitics up until the match of 26 March 2024 against Germany. The players are listed in chronological order according to the date of their debut. Additionally, their dates of birth, number of caps and goals are stated.
